entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon.
